snippet.title: Trouble of Tabu - Play the Demo now!
snippet.description:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1950530/Trouble_of_Tabu/
Discord: https://discord.gg/gZAve6Gm2e

Thank you so much for being here and sharing this special moment with me. The demo of trouble of Tabu is life now! You can download it from steam and it contains the first 30% of the game. 

So what is Trouble of Tabu? ToT is a mixture of a Foddian game and a platformer. In general Foddian games are very unforgiving and has a constant threat of losing huge chunks of progress. Trouble of Tabu is not different in this regard.

I've been working on this project for over 3 years and very excited to be able to share the demo with you all! I hope you like it and please don't forget to give feedback once you have finished the demo. 

Also if you could share it with your friends and family I would be very grateful as well. Finally, if you could leave a nice comment on steam I could/would almost kiss you. Really. 

Good luck and have fun!
